title: The 5 Essential Steps To Starting A Successful Business
summary: Most new businesses fail because they don’t know how to market their products. The majority of businesses spend 80% of their time creating products and only 20% promoting them. Without it, we can\u2019t function properly. Studies show that people who get less than six hours of sleep every night have a harder time focusing, are less alert, and are more prone to making mistakes. Did you know that there are even studies that show getting less than five hours of sleep for two weeks straight can lead to hallucinations and other warning signs of declining mental health?
